divs: Sighting DetailsIf you look in your records about me, you will see the event. I did not speak in right, meaning forword but, backward sorry that you all could not understand. I am Dyslesic, and have another disability... Although I'm not credible enough for you all.... In short, You are missing an Opportunity ... too get some real evidence, about the Blue Door, Blue Light, or what ever it is. I've seen true Video evidence Concerning this type of Obduction ... All though You don't think its credible enough as yet ... Look, I didn't write other things because of NS i"m a H C, or what ever i am, I don't exploit this fact. ... I like being who I am, thus, if you want this true look me up. ... please ... I don't Understand A lot of what happened ... help ... I keep silent, for the most part. ... Always ... !!! ! ?
